amendment.description: To provide that States likely to be effected by the hurricane season in 2007 are afforded a priority in funding for the replacement equipment for the National Guard.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4237 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4237 proposed by Senator Martinez. (consideration: CR S5853-5854; text: CR S5853) To provide that States likely to be effected by the hurricane season in 2007 are afforded a priority in funding for the replacement equipment for the National Guard.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4237 proposed by Senator Martinez.
